content.text:
Here is the dissemination information formatted as requested:

Disseminating Information on BI Tools, Reports, and Metadata

1. BI Tools - Provide training sessions and workshops to demonstrate key features and use cases of BI tools like Tableau, Power BI, QlikView, etc. - Create quick reference guides and cheat sheets for each tool summarizing the main functionality - Record short how-to videos for common tasks in each tool and share via the company intranet or learning portal 2. Reports - Maintain a centralized report catalog or portal where users can easily find and access reports - Include clear descriptions, intended audience, update frequency, and data sources for each report - Highlight new reports in company newsletters, email announcements, or team meetings - Schedule regular touchpoints with key stakeholders to review existing reports and gather new requirements 3. Metadata - Document data definitions, business calculations, and key metrics in a data dictionary - Capture data lineage showing the flow of data from source systems to end reports - Create ER diagrams to visualize relationships between key data entities - Implement a data governance process to review and approve changes to metadata - Socialize metadata enhancements through data stewardship meetings and communications
